--- Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:

> OOC: I don't think you can just take control of General Vorpsal
> without his
> permission.   (if he gave you his permisison then no problem).  The
> minion
> base is a rumor and a mystery so far.  No action has taken place
> there.  I
> think it would be better if you let Nic introduce it since he created
> it.
> By the way, anyone can create minions, you don't necessarily have
> exclusive
> control over the minions, and it wouldn't be a problem for Nic to
> simultaneously play minions and someone attacking minions.  Those are
> just
> my thoughts.

In message 67223 Nic said 'Vorpal is a major NPC. I have no trouble
about someone else
controlling him.' So I am taking just taking temporary control. If Nic
wants him then he is his to take at his leasure. Which is why I was
asking all the questions.
